docs.snippet: An arbitrator sided with the New Orleans Saints in ruling that Jimmy Graham can only be considered a tight end for the purposes of his franchise tag designation....
docs.lead_paragraph: An arbitrator sided with the New Orleans Saints in ruling that Jimmy Graham can only be considered a tight end for the purposes of his franchise tag designation.
docs.abstract: Arbitrator sides with New Orleans Saints, ruling that Jimmy Graham can only be considered a tight end for the purposes of his franchise tag designation; Graham argued that he was used as a wide receiver often enough to qualify for more lucrative receiver tag.

docs.snippet: The Buffalo Bills suffered an early setback to their season: The talented young linebacker Kiko Alonso is likely to miss it because of a knee injury....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Buffalo Bills suffered an early setback to their season: The talented young linebacker Kiko Alonso is likely to miss it because of a knee injury.
docs.abstract: Buffalo Bills linebacker Kiko Alonso is likely to miss 2014-2015 NFL season with knee injury.

headline.main: Bills’ Alonso Likely to Miss Season With Knee Injury

docs.snippet: Texas A&M University and a band of four Buffalo Bills football fans led by a double amputee are in a fight over the use of the school's "12th Man" trademark, with the fans accusing the school of heavy handed tactics to protect its copyright....
docs.lead_paragraph: Texas A&M University and a band of four Buffalo Bills football fans led by a double amputee are in a fight over the use of the school's "12th Man" trademark, with the fans accusing the school of heavy handed tactics to protect its copyright.

headline.main: Texas A&M Tackles Double Amputee Over '12th Man' Football Trademark
headline.print_headline: Texas A&M Tackles Double Amputee Over '12th Man' Football Trademark

docs.snippet: Northwestern University on Thursday urged the National Labor Relations Board to overturn a regional ruling that would allow its scholarship football players to unionize, holding up the football program as exemplifying the university's integration ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Northwestern University on Thursday urged the National Labor Relations Board to overturn a regional ruling that would allow its scholarship football players to unionize, holding up the football program as exemplifying the university's integration of athletics and education.

headline.main: College Presidents Say No to Unions for Athletes
headline.print_headline: College Presidents Say No to Unions for Athletes

docs.snippet: Crimea-based PFC Sevastopol and FC Tavriya have been cut from this season's Ukrainian Premier League following the annexation of the peninsula by Russia, the football federation said on Thursday....

docs.snippet: One person was killed and three others severely injured when a truck trailer carrying fireworks for a Fourth of July celebration at a central Texas high school exploded on Thursday as workers  prepared the show, a fire official said....
docs.lead_paragraph: One person was killed and three others severely injured when a truck trailer carrying fireworks for a Fourth of July celebration at a central Texas high school exploded on Thursday as workers  prepared the show, a fire official said.

headline.main: One Dead, Three Badly Hurt in Texas School Fireworks Explosion
